CustomField.description: This field was used prior to the implementation of project 2122.
CustomField.formula:
( Case(First_Day_Acknowledgement_Of_Request__c, 0, 0, 1) +
Case(Uses_Customers_Name__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Confirms_correct_contact_information__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Demonstrates_Empathy_Apology_Statements__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Uses_Professional_Lang_Tone_On_Call__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Avoids_Long_Pauses_Dead_Air__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Confidence_In_Communication__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Focus_And_Displays_Call_Control__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Initial_Follow_Up_Call_Capture_per_Cal__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Provided_CaseNumber_To_Client_Verbally__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Uses_Proper_Hold_Procedures__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Brands_Correctly_Appreciates_Client__c, 0, 0, 1) +
Case(Customized_Template_If_Needed__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Correct_Template_Chosen_For_Case__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Acknowledges_Displays_Understands_Issue__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Correct_Grammar_Spelling_Punctuation__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Response_Addressed_Correct_Recipients__c, 0, 0, 1) +
Case(Subject_line_accuracy__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Avoids_Unnecessary_Repetition__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Notes_Comments_Made_And_Actions_Taken__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Demonstrates_Product_Knowledge__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(All_Customer_Info_Captured_Updated__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(All_Client_Emails_Answered_And_Actioned__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Case_Tagging_Accuracy__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Agent_Sends_Case_Number_Via_Email__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Directed_Client_To_Online_Help_Or_LS__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Tagged_Correct_Property__c, 0, 0, 1) +
Case(Issue_Not_Resolved_FCR_Next_Steps__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(All_Steps_Are_Taken_To_Resolve__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Refers_Transfer_To_Correct_Department__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Final_Email_All_Issues_Addressed__c, 0, 0, 1) + Case(Completed_Proper_Follow_Up_Procedure__c, 0, 0, 1) )
CustomField.label: Questions Answered
